attributes.action: The Queen should give a televised address uniting us all together after Brexit
attributes.background: This may sound slightly mad, but I think the Queen should make a televised address to the country. We don't have a Prime Minister anymore and we desperately need leadership... Maybe the Queen can actually provide some semblance of continuity and unity... Why else do we have a monarchy?

rejection.details: It would be for Her Majesty the Queen to decide whether to make an address along these lines.
